```{r echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
teamnames <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/teamlist.csv")
playoff <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/tercera_playoff.csv")
table <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/Futbol/data_tables.csv")
table <- table %>% filter(league == 'segunda') %>% left_join(playoff, by = "team")
table$ascens[is.na(table$ascens)] <- 0
table <- table %>% mutate(type1 = type1 + ascens) %>% select(-ascens)
table <- table %>% left_join(teamnames, by = "team")
table <- table[complete.cases(table),]
table$linkteam <- iconv(table$fullname,to="ASCII//TRANSLIT")
table$linkteam <- tolower(gsub("[[:punct:]]", "", table$linkteam))
table$linkteam <- gsub("[[:space:]]", "-", table$linkteam)
table$team <- paste0("[", table$shortname, "](/clubs/", table$linkteam,"-",table$league,")")
table <- table %>% select(-shortname,-fullname,-league,-linkteam, -typex)
kable(table, digits = 1, align = 'lcccccccc', row.names = FALSE, col.names = c('Club', 'Punts', 'GD', 'Ascens', 'Playoffs', 'Descens', 'Favor', 'Contra', 'Qualitat')) %>% add_header_above(c('Projecció de la Classificació' = 1, 'Final' = 2, 'Probabilitat (%)' = 3, 'xGols' = 3)) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T) %>% column_spec(3, border_right = T) %>% column_spec(6, border_right = T)
```
